title: Kayles e doesnt hit tentacles
body: just played a game of aram as kayle, during the game I was forced to go to melee range to hit illoai's tentacles even with kayles e active. It didnt work as splash damage and it didnt work as a single target it still required me to go all the way to it to hit it.

replies.body:
Hey Dusk2dust - 

I caught up with gameplay, and it appears that splash damage shouldn't be applied here. Looks the range is also properly working.

If you're still having issues, could you please upload a video? Thanks!
